content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, nice to meet you. I appreciate your interest in my apartment. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I'm looking forward to a fair agreement. How much are you asking for the apartment?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I am asking for €1,000 per month. I am aware of the market value, but I always aim high to start negotiations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a fair starting point, Mr. Schmidt. I appreciate your honesty. Would you be willing to lower the price, considering the apartment is unfurnished and I am a student on a budget?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your position, but my apartments are in high demand, and I can always find a tenant who is willing to pay my asking price. I could consider lowering the price, but I would have to think about it.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mr. Schmidt. As a student, I'm looking for the best deal possible. Would you be able to provide any additional amenities or services to make the apartment more attractive?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't provide any additional amenities or services. My apartments are in the city center, close to all important facilities, so I don't think it's necessary. However, I can consider lowering the price for you, but not by much. I was thinking about €950 per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: €950 per month is still a bit high for my budget, Mr. Schmidt. I'm looking for something closer to €800 per month. Would that be possible?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: €800 per month is too low for my apartment. I could meet you halfway, but I don't think it's fair to lower the price that much. I could accept €900 per month, but that's as low as I can go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: €900 per month is more reasonable, Mr. Schmidt. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Would you be willing to include a one-month free rent as an incentive for a longer-term lease? Perhaps that could justify the higher monthly rate?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't offer any incentives or discounts for longer-term leases. My apartments are in high demand, and I don't need to convince tenants to stay. However, I can accept €900 per month, and we can agree on a one-year lease term.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: A one-year lease term sounds good to me, Mr. Schmidt. With the €900 per month, I believe we have a deal. TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
